config.placement-modifier.name: Placement Modifier Key
tool.drill.name: Drill
tool.drill.description:
It can clear space underground.
Make sure you have your x-ray goggles on!
tool.wire-cutter.name: Wire Cutter
tool.wire-cutter.description:
Connects connectors of the same type using metal bars for wires.
Copper for power, iron for logic.
message.drill.need-goggles: You need x-ray goggles on to use this!
message.wire-cutter.need-wire: You need metal bars for the wire.
message.wire-cutter.wrong-wire: The metal bar selected is incorrect for this connector.
item.conveyor.name: Conveyor Belt
item.conveyor.description:
Can move items around.
Can be placed underground (when wearing x-ray goggles) or on scaffolding.
Logic connectors below it can reverse the direction.
logic connectors on the sides will detect items on the conveyor.
item.unhopper.name: Unhopper
item.unhopper.description:
Removes items from machines and places them onto nearby conveyor belts.
(Starts with a conveyor beneath it underground, then goes to the west, south, and east, then goes above.
item.logic-connector.name: Logic Connector
item.logic-connector.description:
Use wire cutters with iron to connect logic connectors.
A connector will connect to the object in the direction you are facing.
If holding the run button, it will connect below.
If holding the Misapplied Physicalities Placement Modifier button
(left ctrl by default, changeable in GMCM), it will connect above.
item.lever-block.name: Lever Block
item.lever-block.description:
A block sending a logic signal on all sides.
0 if lever is facing left, 1 if lever is facing right.
